quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Anonymous

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Anonymous

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Anonymous

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: Love is a many-splendored thing.
author: Paul Simon

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Perseverance is the key to overcoming obstacles.
author: Anonymous

quote: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Anonymous

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Focus is the key to unlocking your potential.
author: Anonymous

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It’s about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
author: Mabel Newcomer

quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Leadership is not about being the best. It’s about making everyone else better.
author: Anonymous

quote: A true leader doesn’t create followers, they create more leaders.
author: Anonymous

quote: Leadership is not about being the boss, it’s about showing the way.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Leadership is about influence, not authority.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Anytime you start to miss her and want to text her remember that there's a guy on her phone who doesn't have to text her first.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
author: Anonymous

quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: When you feel like quitting, remember why you started.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
author: John Lennon

quote: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like.
author: Anonymous

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They're not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
author: James A. Michener

quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Your focus determines your reality.
author: George Lucas

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
author: John Carmack

quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people where to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
author: John Zenger

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make. It will not only improve your life, it will improve the lives of all those around you.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: You are your only limit.
author: Anonymous

quote: The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is. Self-knowledge has no end.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.
author: Helmut Schmidt

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi
